05.title: Halcyon
description: • Composer & Arranger: KaNa (Otographic Music / Snow Freques)
• Programmed, Produced & Mixed by KaNa (Otographic Music / Snow Freques)
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)

• About this track: Enjoy a momentary escape from reality with uplifting, positive sounds filled with hope for tomorrow! When we close our eyes, there is a blue sky and we are always free to spread our wings and fly. There we can soar as high as we want on the wind. We can go as far as our imagination can take us, just like "Halcyon".

• Used VSTs & Samples: Diva, Serum, Serum2, Spire, Nexus4
• About this track: liberate from human

07.title: Rise
description: • Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Used VSTs & Samples: Usually Spire, and Serum, Vital etc. And for sample, I used mostly Nhato sample packs in this one.
• About this track: I tried making progressive and calm trance. I think it's good to take a break doing something calm like this.

08.title: Orbital
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by PSYQUO
• Used VSTs & Samples: Surge XT (main arp), Albion One (strings and brass), AbbeyRoad Modern Drummer (acoustic drum fills)

• About this track: Hey, it is PSYQUO again! The track "Orbital" is about embodying a journey orbiting through space. I feel like everything in the universe is destined to orbit around, don't you think? Try to imagine circling around through our vast universe while listening to the track. That's it for me and as always, thanks for listening!

01.title: tell me
description: • Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)

02.title: Noctilucent Glow
description: • Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Used VSTs & Samples: Warp Star SFX from Kirby's Return to Dream Land

• About this track: noctilucent clouds are made purely of ice crystals, forming around 80 km above the ground. too faint to see during the day, they only show themselves during astronomical twilight, when the sun barely illuminates the upper atmosphere. the grass may be greener on the other side, but fleeting beauty still shimmers overhead. don't forget to look up from the lawn every once in a while.

03.title: Echoes of Hope
description: • Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Used VSTs & Samples: Dune 3, Nexus, Omnisphere, Native Instruments Utopia, Heavyocity Vocalise 2, Mimi Page Light & Shadow, Black Octopus Leviathan

• About this track: I rarely mix organic instruments with super modern electronic sounds and to be honest it turned out really well. Also the creation of this track wouldn't be possible without Fivda so, thanks.
Key: G minor, briefly changes to A# minor at around 3:22

04.title: coalescent
description: • Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)

• About this track: I had an idea for this album for the longest time, unable to figure out how to move forward with it or if I even wanted to.  I wasn't able to make the time I wanted for it, and every day that passed this album loomed more and more over my head, pressuring me to make something or give up. Mere days before the deadline, I finally sat down and forced myself to make progress - and at that moment, all the inspiration hit me in a wave.  Despite believing I didn't have enough time, I was suddenly writing lyrics and using Synthesizer V 2 (which had released the same day), and I turned a minute-long snippet into 8 minutes of soaring emotions.  I think incorporating vocals ended up being critical to breathing life into this track - though she only appeared in brief bursts, Mo Xu's incredibly rich vocal qualities were the soul that I was trying to capture for so long.  It was immensely reassuring that I was able to pull through when it counted, and that it turned out how it did with so little time left.

05.title: Free From Emotion
description: • Programmed, Produced & Mixed by Eyhz (Bliss And Innocence)
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Used VSTs & Samples: Vocals are from producer space euphoric trance vocals

06.title: Purity
description: • Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Used VSTs & Samples: Serum2 KORG M1 Sylenth1
• About this track: Fast, uplifting, techno.

07.title: Blooming Flower
description: • Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Used VSTs & Samples: Stock Renoise effects, Valhalla Supermassive, Valhalla Shimmer and reFX Nexus

• About this track: I've been trying to make trance stuff for a while now, and I think this is the first time where it all finally came together. I wanted to play with the idea of the song using repetition while still feeling varied enough, usually in most of my other songs I tend to introduce new ideas quite quickly instead of reusing what i have; meanwhile in this one I let it develop according to the ideas already established beforehand.

08.title: Sweet Fallin
description: • Programmed, Produced, Mixed & Mastered by Sandi Setiawan
• Used VSTs & Samples: Xfer Serum, Vital

• About this track: Introducing "Sweet Fallin" for ECLECTIC RESONANCE Escapism! Let "Sweet Falling" transport you to a realm of pure bliss, where music meets magic. Inspired by life's simple joys, "Sweet Fallin" is a heartfelt ode to happiness and resilience.
